name: PinballHead
description:
Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam in 48 hours! 

Avoid orcs in this fast paced third person shooter/pinball arcade game where your only projectile is your own skull. Enhance your score by increasing the amount of bounces between each successful enemy hit. Have fun, earn points, don't lose your head!

W = forward

A = left

D = right

MouseClick = Fire/Recall Skull

Programming -Ben Barriage

Level Design -Armando Califano

Game Design -Ben Barriage & Armando Califano

Art Assets were grabbed from

KayKit - Dungeon Pack by Kay Lousberg (itch.io)

Audio Tracks are from

Ninja Adventure - Asset Pack by pixel-boy (itch.io)
